x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying circlex-locations relative to center

y.description: A numeric vector, unit object, or a character vectorof values containing a "b" combined with a numeric valuespecifying circle y-locations relative to center.The character vector will place circle y-locations relative tothe bottom of the most recently plotted plot accordingto the units of the plotgardener page

r.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying radii

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{r}, \code{x}, or \code{y} are only given as numerics ornumeric vectors. Default value is \code{default.units = "inches"}. Options include: "inches", "cm", "npc", "snpc", "native", "mm", "points"

linecolor.description: A character value specifying circle line color.Default value is \code{linecolor = "black"}

lwd.description: A numeric specifying circle line width.Default value is \code{lwd = 1}

lty.description: A numeric specifying circle line type.Default value is \code{lty = 1}

fill.description: A character value specifying circle fill color.Default value is \code{fill = NA}

alpha.description: A numeric value specifying color transparency.Default value is \code{alpha = 1}

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
